casebody.data:
Sharon LASKIN, et al., petitioners,
v.
Veronica SIEGEL, Individually and as Trustee of the Phillip P. Siegel Revocable Trust Dated August 28, 1998, and as Executor of the Estate of Phillip P. Siegel, et al. No. 13-942. Supreme Court of the United States April 21, 2014.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.
